name: Deadly Night (itch) (miguch)
description:
During your exploration of a remote cemetery, you witness two bandits being killed by a giant troll after robbing another explorer named John. To go back alive, you must begin a life-or-death fight with the monster and get back John's belongings...

Control:

W/A/S/D - move

Left Mouse Click - attack/interact

E - Switch weapon

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump/Skip cutscene

Tab - show in-game control guide

How to play: 

  • Pick up the katana at the left of the cemetery gate and the rifle in the crypt. 
  • Be careful with stamina because it's very hard to dodge the troll's attack without sprinting.
  • Keep yourself and John alive.

Features: 

  • Melee Attack
  • Range Attack with projectile weapon
  • First person view
  • Sound Effect
